https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/AqwG95ZLcf4zTnDgQvn4BKYcrvu.jpg A companion to legendary Cuban musician Manuel Galb√°n's last album. Bluechacha puts image to the sound as it takes us through the process of recording the album, while artistically recreating the music in the form of a love story set in contemporary Cuba. Nominated to the Latin Grammy in the category of Best Long-Form Music Video. Bluechacha
